1.content:
Welcome To The Land Before Time World.

Which Dinosaur is the chosen main character?
1.title: Welcome to the Great Valley and Beyond.

11.content:
You have chosen Littlefoot The Longneck.

What adventure does he go on?
11.title: Littlefoot

112.content: What does Littlefoot transform into?
112.title: Littlefoot transforms into something

choices: He was hit by a mysterious beam of light
1121.content: How did Littlefoot become a adult longneck?
1121.title: An adult Longneck

1122.content: Which dinosaur should be become?
1122.title: A different species of dinosaur

11222.content: Will it just be his body changing or his mind as well?
11222.title: His mother's killer

112222.content:
So, when does this transformation take place?
(This will affect the choices further on).
112222.title: Both

choices: Whilst his mother was protecting him
1122221.content: What part of the film?
1122221.title: During the first film

choices: Immediately after whilst he was crying over his mother's body
During the final battle at the end of the film
11222212.content: At which point after his mother's death?
11222212.title: After his mother's  death

1123.content:
What else could Littlefoot transform into?

Perhaps he transforms in such a way that he grows more heads; effectively becoming a Hydra-Longneck?

Or maybe you want things to get really weird for Littlefoot, by turning him into a human?
1123.title: Something else

choices: Littlefoot transforms into an inanimate object
11233.content:
What else could Littlefoot transform into?

Perhaps the poor dino ends up transforming into an inanimate object; like a rock, or a tree?

Or, something really freaky could happen by transforming him into a Dino-Chimera; i.e. a mix of many different dinosaurs?
11233.title: Try something else...

112333.content:
What else could Littlefoot transform into?

Perhaps he has a transformation that makes his body humanoid, turning him into an anthropomorphic dinosaur?

Or, perhaps he has a transformation that causes a pair of wings to grow on his back, allowing Littlefoot to fly?
112333.title: An Anthro-Dino, or A Winged Longneck?

choices: His changes has something to do with his species
113.content: What else could happen to Littlefoot?
113.title: Something Else

choices: Littlefoot swaps bodies with another young dinosaur
Littlefoot swaps bodies with an adult dinosaur
Can you think of anything else?
1131.content: Okay; so Littlefoot will have a body-swapping adventure, but who does he swap with: one of the other young dinos, or one of the adult ones?
1131.title: He swaps bodies with someone

choices: Littlefoot swaps bodies with someone else
11311.content:
Which one of his young friends does Littlefoot swap bodies with?


Perhaps he swaps bodies with Cera, the female Three-Horn?

Or, maybe he swaps bodies with Chomper, the male Sharptooth?
11311.title: Littlefoot swaps bodies with another young dino...

choices: Littlefoot swaps bodies with an adult Leaf-Eater
Littlefoot swaps bodies with an adult Sharptooth
11312.content:
What kind of adult dinosaur does Littlefoot end up swapping bodies with?


Does he swap bodies with an adult 'Leaf-Eater' (the herbivore dinosaurs), or an adult Sharptooth (the carnivore dinosaurs)?
11312.title: Littlefoot swaps bodies with an adult dinosaur

choices: Littlefoot swaps bodies with a Tyrannosaurus
Littlefoot swaps bodies with a Carnotaurus (Horned Sharptooth)
113122.content: Okay; so you want to give Littlefoot a bit of a fright by having him swap bodies with an adult Sharptooth, but what kind of Sharptooth does he swap bodies with?
113122.title: Littlefoot swaps bodies with an adult Sharptooth

choices: Option 1: A New Stone of Cold Fire
1131221.content:
So; how does Littlefoot end up swapping bodies with a fierce, adult Tyrannosaurus? Here is a couple of options.


Option 1: After another 'Stone of Cold Fire' shows up in the sky Littlefoot sees it breaking in two, with one half landing in the Mysterious Beyond and the other landing in the Great Valley. The next day, Littlefoot and his friends go to see the stone. However, unlike the last one, this stone HAS magical properties, so when Littlefoot touches the stone, he accidentally ends up swapping bodies with a huge Sharptooth in the Mysterious Beyond who'd touched the other half because it thought that it was eatible.
Littlefoot now has big problems, for although he quickly figures out how and what caused him to swap, the young Longneck is still stuck in the body of an adult Sharptooth, which means that he not only has to get used to suddenly being a biped, but he also has to figure out a way to send a message to his friends so that he can swap back again.
Meanwhile, all of Littlefoots friends are frightened of the behavior of whom they think is Littlefoot, since the Sharptooth's savage brain can't really comprehend that it's now in the body of a young Longneck...

Option 2: One day, Littlefoot finds a strange new bush in the Great Valley. After eating some of the leaves on the bush, he then has a conversation with Chomper, which for one second causes Littlefoot to want to try being a Sharptooth. At the exact same time, in the Mysterious Beyond, a savage Sharptooth gets a burning desire to enter the Great Valley (to find more food). During the night, the odd leaves that Littlefoot ate causes his mind to be exchanged with that of the Sharptooth, because the leaves has the power to grant any strong desires and this way, it gets to grant the desires of two beings at once.
While the Sharptooth in Littlefoot's body causes confusion and worry throughout the Great Valley, Littlefoot in the Sharptooth's body has to figure out a way to let his friend know of the situation he's in, since the only way to swap back is to get the Sharptooth in his body to eat some more of the strange leaves.
But this turns out to be quite a challenge; because not only doesthe frightened Littlefoot have to get used to his new, enormous body, but he soon finds out that the Sharptooth whose body he is in, has rivals. Rivals that won't hesitate to try and eliminate the Sharptooth whose body Littlefoot currently occupies...
1131221.title: Littlefoot swaps bodies with a Tyrannosaurus

choices: Littlefoot swaps bodies with a Compsognathus
Littlefoot swaps bodies with a Velociraptor
1131223.content: What other kind of Sharptooth does Littlefoot swap bodies with?
1131223.title: Other choices

choices: Littlefoot swaps bodies with a mammal
Littlefoot swaps bodies with an insect
11313.content:
Perhaps Littlefoot will end up swapping bodies with an animal that's not a dinosaur; like a mammal?


Or, if you want it to get really weird, we could have him swap bodies with some kind of insect?
11313.title: From Dino To... Mammal? Or Something Stranger?

choices: Littlefoot 'swaps bodies' with an inanimate object
Littlefoot swaps bodies with a modern-day person
113133.content:
Perhaps Littlefoot ends up swapping 'bodies' with an inanimate object, like a rock, or a tree; leaving the poor Longneck's conciousness aware, but trapped in an immovable object, while leaving his body alive, but incapable of doing anything?

Or, maybe Littlefoot ends up swapping bodies across the time-stream; sending Litllefoot's mind millions of years into the future and into the body of a modern-day person, while that person's mind goes back in time and into Littlefoot's body?
113133.title: Other Odd Body-Swaps...

choices: He turns into a different species of dinosaur
He swaps his species with another dinosaur
1132.content: What kind of species-related change will happen to Littlefoot?
1132.title: His changes has something to do with his species

11321.title: He turns into a different species of dinosaur

113212.content: A flyer, or another species?
113212.title: Hey, wait a minute!!!!

1133.content:
What else could happen to Littlefoot?

Perhaps he gets the abillity to remove his soul from his body, allowing him to float like a ghost around The Great Valley and possess other dinosaurs?


Or, perhaps Littlefoot somehow gets a much bigger brain, which increases his intellect to levels far beyond that of any other dinosaur and allows him to think up inventions that otherwise wouldn't be discovered for millions of years (like: an elevator, a fishing rod, a cart, ect.)?
1133.title: Spirit-Dino, or Brainy-Dino?

choices: He drinks out of a magical watering hole
11332.content: So, you want Littlefoot to become the smartest dinosaur of all time, but how does he aquire this genius intellect?
11332.title: Littlefoot gets a LOT smarter

11333.content: Maybe littlefoor finally grows bigger and way bigger than everyone else
11333.title: Choose something else

choices: As big as an adult Threehorn
As big as an adult Longneck
113331.content: How much bigger does he grow?
113331.title: Growing Littlefoot

1133312.content: How did Littlefoot get that big?
1133312.title: As big as an adult Longneck

1133313.content:
Here are some more growth-options for Littlefoot to undergo, for making the young dinosaur really big...


Option 1: After drinking from a strange glowing watering hole, Littlefoot begins to have sudden growth-spurts. However, he only grows when he is inside a realatively inclosed space where he can fit; like a cave, a hollow tree, or something similar. He will then grow just enough to completly fill up the aforementioned space and not an inch more.
This could prove to be a problem if he decides to play hide-and-seek with his friends as he would be constantly looking for bigger and bigger places to hide his growing form.
It could cause even more trouble if he ends up falling asleep in a big cave, since he would end up growing MUCH bigger in his sleep; though that depends on the size of the cave...

Option 2: After eating a weird-tasting tree-star, Littlefoot obtains the power to siphon physical size from another dinosaur to himself, and vice versa. Unfortunatly; he doesn't know that he has this power at first, which results in him slowly growing while all other dinosaurs near him grow smaller.
When he does figure out what is going on, most of the other dinosaurs in the Great Valley have shrunk down to be smaller than the grass, while Littlefoot himself has grown so big that his body towers above everything else in the Valley, even allowing him to see over the great cliffs that circle it. He then has to find a way to give everyone their size back, either before he accidentally steps on someone, or before everyone else shink into nothingness...
1133313.title: More choices

choices: His changes has something to do with his size
His changes has something to do with his age
114.content: What else could happen to Littlefoot?
114.title: Something Else

choices: He swaps his size with someone else
1141.content: What kind of size-related changes will happen to Littlefoot?
1141.title: His changes has something to do with his size

choices: Littlefoot gets the power to alter his own size
Littlefoot gets the power to manipulate the size of himself and others
11413.content:
What other size-related changes could happen to Littlefoot?

Maybe Littlefoot will get the power to change his own size, allowing him to grow and shrink as much as he wants?

Or, perhaps he will aquire the abillity to manipulate the size of himself and other dinosaurs; by either siphoning off some size from them to himself, (making Littlefoot bigger and the other dino smaller), or by giving some of his own size, siphoned or otherwise, to other dinosaurs, (making the other dinosaur bigger and Littlefoot smaller)?
11413.title: Other size-related changes

115.content: What else could happen to Littlefoot?
115.title: Something Else

1152.content:
What kind of mental changes could happen to Littlefoot?

Perhaps he gets a whole new personality?

Or maybe his intellect increases, giving him knowledge of things that will first be discovered millions of years from his time (like how to build houses, create wheels, how to write, ect.)?
1152.title: He experiences mental changes

choices: A Young Dinosaur in The Modern World!
1153.content:
What else could happen to Littlefoot?

Perhaps he gets the power to change and alter his own body in any way that he wants; like making his long neck even longer so he can reach the top of the trees, giving himself the back legs of a Horned Sharptooth (Carnotaurus) to win a race against his friends, growing horns like a Three-Horn to help Cera out with a problem, ect.?


Or, maybe Littlefoot discovers a mysterious cave which sends him millions of years fowards in time to our present day; an event which both shocks and facinates the adventurous dinosaur?
1153.title: Alteration Adventure, or Time Travel Adventure?

choices: He drinks out of a magical watering hole
11531.content: How does Littlefoot get the power to alter himself?
11531.title: Littlefoot is now a Morpher-Dino!

12.content: What kind of change is going to happen to her?
12.title: Cera

info.brief_description: Join your seven favorite dinos in your own all new adventures by yourself.
info.description:
Rules:

1. Keep it clean.
2. Humans are welcomed as they are ancient ones.
3. Anything goes.
4. Inflations are welcomed.
5. Creatures from the three eras in geology are welcomed.
6. Transformation are encouraged.
7. Have fun in The Great Valley or in The Mysterious Beyond!
